resources.string: Select the queue that you want to join from the companies near by or scan a code below.
These people are already in line and will get served before you.
This is your ticket number, we\'ll let you know when it\'s time for you to show up.
This is an estimation of how long you have to wait. Make sure that you are back on time.
You can give up your place in the queue by clicking the button below.
